name: @restatedev/create-app
description: Project template generator for the Restate TypeScript SDK
author: Restate Developers

scripts.build-template: cd template && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-grpc-template: cd template_grpc && npm install && npm run proto && npm run build
scripts.clean-grpc-template: rm -rf template_grpc/dist template_grpc/src/generated template_grpc/node_modules template_grpc/proto/buf.lock template_grpc/package-lock.json
scripts.build-templates: npm run build-template && npm run build-grpc-template
scripts.clean-templates: npm run clean-template && npm run clean-grpc-template
